items.description: Ban a specific member from the Discord server (irreversible)
Temporarily ban a member from a server for a specific amount of time
Mute a member so that they can't speak or type in the whole server
Temporarily mute a member so that they can neither speak nor type in the whole server
Unmute a member in chat
Used to enable (or disable) slow mode in a specific channel
Kick a Discord member from the server(can be invited again)
Show how many infractions a specific user has in the server
Warn a member for rule breaking or other infractions
Clear messages in a specific channel
Tip in coins direct to someone ex : $tip @Donald 1 XRP
Tip in fiat direct to someone ex : $tip @Donald $1
Tip everyone on voice channel
Tips everyone active (not muted/deafened) on your Discord voice channel
Tip x Random People in the channel ex : $tip 10 random 1 XRP
Tip active people on the channel (default is last 500 messages)

- Tip active people in the last x messages ex : $tip active last 50 messages 1 XRP 
 - Tip active people in the last x minutes ex : $tip active last 5 minutes 1 XRP
Include pople offline ex : $tip all active last 5 minutes 1 XRP (if just disconnected will have tip anyway)
The amount written will be given to each mentionned recipient ex : $tip voice 1 XRP each
Recipient can be role ex : $tip @moderators 1000 XRP each ;-)
